/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings and trees that line the street. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, stand tall against the backdrop of a hazy blue sky. Their red roofs add a pop of color to the otherwise monochrome palette.

The street itself is lined with trees, their bare branches reaching out into the sky, suggesting that the season might be winter or early spring. A car is parked on the side of the road, adding a touch of modern life to the scene. In the distance, a bridge can be seen, hinting at the city's infrastructure.

The image is bathed in the soft light of day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. Despite the absence of people, the image exudes a sense of life and vibrancy, characteristic of bustling city streets. The overall composition of the image, with its blend of natural and man-made elements, paints a vivid picture of a day in the life of Beijing.
